title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 96.8 - Limit on account
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 96.8 - Limit on account

State Regulations

Notwithstanding any other provision of this Part, except to the extent approved by the superintendent, at no time shall the balance of the surplus management account exceed the surplus of the insurance company as reported on its most recent annual statement. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
96.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
